#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int c[26],d[26],i,found,t;
	string a,b;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
		if(a.length()!=b.length())
		printf("NO\n");
		else
		{
			found=1;
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			c[i]=0;
			d[i]=0;
		}
		for(i=0;i<a.length();i++)
		c[a[i]-'a']++;
		for(i=0;i<b.length();i++)
		d[b[i]-'a']++;
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		if(c[i]!=d[i])
		{
			found=0;
			break;
		}
		if(found)
		printf("YES\n");
		else
		printf("NO\n");
	    }
	}
}
